name: Jiro Ono
description: Jiro Ono is regarded by his contemporaries as one of the greatest living sushi craftsmen and is credited with innovating methods used in modern sushi preparation.

name: Natsuko Shoji
description: Natsuk Shoji is the 2022 recipient of the Asia’s Best Female Chef Award by Asia’s 50 Best Restaurants. She is also the recipient of the Asia’s Best Pastry Chef Award in 2020.

name: Masaharu Morimoto
description: Masaharu Morimoto is known for his unique fusion cuisine. His cuisine takes advantage of Japanese color combinations and aromas and uses Chinese spices and simple Italian ingredients, while maintaining a refined French style of presentation.

name: Nobuyuki “Nobu” Matsuhisa
description: Nobuyuki “Nobu” Matsuhisa is a Japanese celebrity chef and restaurateur known for his fusion cuisine, blending traditional Japanese dishes with Peruvian ingredients. His signature dish is black cod in miso.

name: Hiroyuki Sakai
description: Hiroyuki Sakai is best known as the second, final, and longest-serving Iron Chef French on the Japanese television show Iron Chef

name: Niki Nakayama
description: Niki Nakayama is a Japanese-American chef who specializes modern Japanese kaiseki cuisine. She is the owner of Michelin-starred n/naka restaurant in Los Angeles.
